    • Method Detail

      • init

        public static void init()
        This method initializes the forwarding tables and populates them This should be called before any Layer 3 methods

      • receiveFromLayer2

        public static void receiveFromLayer2(Layer3Frame frame,
                     Host host)
        This method will receive from Layer 2 and determine if the packet is for this host
        Parameters:
        frame - The frame to be processed
        host - The host that the packet is currently at

      • receiveFromLayer4

        public static void receiveFromLayer4(Layer3Frame frame,
                     byte[] finalDestination,
                     Host host)
        This method will receive a packet from layer 4, assign a next hop and a checksum and send it down to layer 2
        Parameters:
        frame - The frame to be processed
        finalDestination - The byte array representation of the final host
        host - The current host (Location)

      • getNextHop

        public static byte[] getNextHop(byte[] finalDestAddress,
                Host host)
        This method will look at a forwarding table and determine the next hop
        Parameters:
        finalDestAddress - The address of the final host
        host - the current host
        Returns:
        a byte array representation of the IP address of the next hop

      • createTables

        public static void createTables()
        This method will hard code the forwarding tables based on the projects given topology

      • calculateChecksum

        public static byte[] calculateChecksum(byte[] buf)
        This method will take the body of a frame and calculate the IPv4 checksum and insert it into the IPv4 Header
        Parameters:
        buf - The body of the frame to be processed
        Returns:
        a byte array representation of the IPv4 Checksum
